# constraints

**Instance Property**

The constraints used to position current layer’s sublayers.

## Declaration

```swift
var constraints: [CAConstraint]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

macOS apps can use this property to access their layer-based constraints. Before constraints can be applied, you must also assign a [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAConstraintLayoutManager] object to the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/layoutManager] property of the layer.

iOS apps do not support layer-based constraints.

## Managing layer constraints

- **addConstraint(_:)**: Adds the specified constraint to the layer.
